name: Unprofessional Mischief
description:
=Living in a purgatory exist a father and daughter enjoying life in their multiple district stopping train. What mischief will they get into??=

Shoot your way through enemies and purchase items to grow stronger!!! The more enemies you kill the more money you get! Get that ramen!!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move

Space: Shoot

ESC: Pause

Big thanks to Peti and Factzmachine for helping me make this game!!

v.1.1

Increased HP to 5

Increased Invincibility Duration to 2.5 seconds

v.1.2

Decreased the Scroll Speed

Decreased the starting cost of the items in shop

v.1.3

Adjusted player movement speed

Rearranged some levels

Adjusted enemy values
